room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: If you are new to escape rooms than this room will certainly feel passable. If you've played a few mid to high quality escape rooms you'll definatly be disappointed. The puzzles are ones that are relatively regurgitated in the industry and the theme is really lacking. The set quality is  mediocre and if you're expecting to be creeped out or scared try escape rooms closer to Manhattan.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: We had such a great time! Cabin in the Woods was a ton of fun. Host Jamie was fantastic! Definitely plan to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: My daughter and her friends did the Cabin in the Woods tonight and they had a blast! Thanks so much to the staff that was so friendly and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: The atmosphere is not bad, it's a little better than most long island escape rooms but it's still lackluster. The puzzles are uneventful but challenging.  If you're new to escape rooms and up for a challenge its worth the visit.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: We had a group of four for the Cabin in the Woods room in Yaphank. It was challenging and very fun. You are allotted three hints if you need them. The game is very well designed. Our host Amanda was great! Very friendly, helpful and willing to answer questions before and after the game. We will be returning to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods Escape" by LI Escape Game in New York
review: We did the Cabin in the Woods and it was a a lot of fun and great experience. Can't wait to try another room.
